Name: Infinite Chili Sauce  无尽的辣酱
About the game: This is a placement game about chili sauce Game Features 1. Need to keep producing hot sauce and finish your own hot sauce empire 2. Easy to play, just a little bit, you can play smoothly. 3. Rich skills and promotion system, let you hang up to the old days PS: The game will not add BGM. You can open the music player. Put your favorite songs. Then open the game and hang up easily and happily.
